description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Federal President re-elected; memorial to victims of Nazism - the church of Maria Regina; an international seminar at Berlin; the new clinic of the Free University where a modern hospital is being built; Berlin's pavilion at the World Fair; the new "Otto Hahn", a nuclear-powered cargo vessel; the Cologne Sports College and the German Derby in Hamburg.
